#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int rever(int x)
{
    int revers=0;
    while(x!=0)
    {
        revers*=10;
        revers+=x%10;
        x/=10;
    }
    return revers;
}
int main()
{
    int t,a1,a2;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a1;
        cin>>a2;
        a1=rever(a1);
        a2=rever(a2);
        a1=rever(a1+a2);
        cout<<a1<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
